mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(new_dt, 'yyyy') AS new_dt, TO_CHAR(new_dt, 'yyyy-q') AS new_dt, TO_CHAR(new_dt, 'yyyy-mm') AS new_dt, cust_dscd_nm, COUNT(*) AS count FROM loan_info WHERE bank_code = #{bankCode} AND new_dt BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{stDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') GROUP BY TO_CHAR(new_dt, 'yyyy'), TO_CHAR(new_dt, 'yyyy-q'), TO_CHAR(new_dt, 'yyyy-mm'), cust_dscd_nm ORDER BY new_dt

WITH ranges AS ( SELECT 0 AS lower_bound, 1000000 AS upper_bound FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 1000000, 2000000 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 2000000, 4000000 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 4000000, 7000000 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 7000000, 10000000 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 10000000, 20000000 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 20000000, 30000000 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 30000000, 80000000 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 80000000, NULL FROM DUAL ), all_cust_dscd_nm AS ( SELECT DISTINCT cust_dscd_nm FROM loan_info ) SELECT CONCAT(r.lower_bound, CONCAT('~', NVL(TO_CHAR(r.upper_bound), ''))) AS range, acn.cust_dscd_nm, SUM(NVL(CASE WHEN l.NEW_LN_AMT >= r.lower_bound AND (l.NEW_LN_AMT < r.upper_bound OR r.upper_bound IS NULL) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END, 0)) AS count FROM ranges r CROSS JOIN all_cust_dscd_nm acn LEFT JOIN loan_info l ON acn.cust_dscd_nm = l.cust_dscd_nm AND (l.NEW_LN_AMT >= r.lower_bound AND (l.NEW_LN_AMT < r.upper_bound OR r.upper_bound IS NULL)) AND l.bank_code = #{bankCode} AND l.new_dt BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{stDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') GROUP BY r.lower_bound, r.upper_bound, acn.cust_dscd_nm ORDER BY r.lower_bound, acn.cust_dscd_nm
